guidelines.book_source: Thinner Leaner Stronger by Michael Matthews

primary_exercises.rationale: Superior glute activation for aesthetic lower body development
Builds upper chest for aesthetic chest proportions
Builds shoulder width for V-taper aesthetic

guidelines.exercise_order: 1. Compounds (chest, back, legs), 2. Isolation (shoulders, arms), 3. Target weak points
guidelines.volume_guidelines: 12-20 sets per muscle group per week, emphasizing problem areas
guidelines.periodization: Linear progression with periodic deloads every 6-8 weeks

primary_exercises.rationale: Fundamental strength movement targeting entire lower body
Ultimate test of full-body strength and power
Builds functional upper body pressing strength

guidelines.volume_guidelines: Low volume (9-15 sets per week), high intensity (85%+ 1RM)
guidelines.periodization: Linear progression for beginners, periodization for advanced

primary_exercises.rationale: Develops explosive power and rate of force development
Plyometric power development and jumping ability
Unilateral strength and stability for sport movements

guidelines.exercise_order: 1. Power/explosive movements, 2. Strength, 3. Speed/agility, 4. Energy system work
guidelines.volume_guidelines: Moderate volume with emphasis on movement quality and power output
guidelines.periodization: Periodized around competition schedule with planned peaks

guidelines.book_source: Becoming a Supple Leopard by Kelly Starrett

primary_exercises.rationale: Maintains hip and ankle mobility while building functional strength
Functional carrying strength and postural endurance
Core stability and spine health maintenance

guidelines.volume_guidelines: Low to moderate intensity with daily movement practice
guidelines.periodization: Consistent progressive loading with emphasis on movement quality

guidelines.book_source: Becoming a Supple Leopard by Kelly Starrett

primary_exercises.rationale: Addresses hip internal and external rotation mobility

guidelines.exercise_order: 1. Warm-up movements, 2. Dynamic stretching, 3. Static stretching, 4. Relaxation
guidelines.volume_guidelines: High frequency (daily) with moderate duration (20-30 minutes)
guidelines.periodization: Progressive range of motion increases with consistent daily practice
